name: Chicken and Spinach Parmesan
ingredients: 3 ounces freshly grated parmesan cheese, 3/4 cup

instructions.en: Arrange chicken and spinach in a greased 8x8" baking dish.
Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, pepper, parmesan cheese, and mozzarella cheese.
Spread mixture over the chicken and spinach.
Bake uncovered at 350ยบ for 40 minutes or until the top is nicely browned.

notes: Makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Don't skimp on the baking. The topping needs to be quite brown for good flavor.
